description.x-y:
Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier
for plants to grow. This raises the Attack
and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier
for plants to grow. This raises the Attack
and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.

Grass-type Pokémon.

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.
effect.shortEffect: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.
